intro: Scorzonera graminea, commonly known as the common scorzonera, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. Scorzonera graminea is often found in meadows, grasslands, and along roadsides, thriving in well-drained soils. It has been used in traditional medicine for its potential health benefits.
